'''Michiel Huisman''' is a Dutch actor who has been cast as [[Daario Naharis]] in the [[Season 4|fourth season]].<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/08/treme-actor-joins-the-cast/ Winter Is Coming]</ref> He replacedÂ [[Ed Skrein]], who played the character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. Michiel is set to join the main cast for the [[Season 5|fifth season]].<ref>http://www.hypable.com/2014/01/08/game-of-thrones-season-5-michiel-huisman/</ref>

Michiel Huisman made several appearances in Dutch movies before he left to the USA. He appeared with [[Carice van Houten]] in the movie ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Book_(film) Black Book].'' He was also in the [[HBO]] series ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treme_(TV_series) Treme]'' and the ABC series ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nashville_(2012_TV_series) Nashville]''. He is a current guest star on the BBC America/Space series ''[[wikipedia:Orphan_Black|Orphan Black]]''.

Michiel has also appeared in several American made movies like ''[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_Z_(film) World War Z]'' in 2013, ''[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wild_(film) Wild]'' in 2014 and will co-star as the male lead in the upcoming epic romance movie ''[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Age_of_Adaline The Age of Adaline]'' opposite [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blake_Lively Blake Lively] in April 2015. He is also set to star opposite his Game of Thrones co-star [[Natalie Dormer]] in the upcoming thriller film [[wikipedia:The_Forest_(2016_film)|''The Forest'']] in 2016.
